writings.text: 渇しても盗泉の水を飲まず

readings.text: かっしてもとうせんのみずをのまず

furigana.writing: 渇しても盗泉の水を飲まず
furigana.reading: かっしてもとうせんのみずをのまず

glossary: better starve than fatten on ill-gotten wealth
don't lower yourself to unjust acts, no matter how desperate you are
refraining to drink from a spring called Robber's Spring even if thirsty
